turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I want to order some pizzas from Amazonas Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I can help you with that. How many pizzas do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want three pizzas for my friends.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what size pizzas do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want 2 large and 1 medium pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What do you want on the pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want just cheese on the medium pizza. I want pepperoni and onion on one of the large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What do you want on the other large pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah, I want the meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. So you want just cheese on the medium pizza, pepperoni and onion on a large pizza, and the meat lovers on the other large pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, can you add garlic to the medium cheese pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I will add garlic to the medium cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you want before I place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, actually, please order a two liter of Coca Cola.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will add a two liter of Coca Cola to your order. Can I get you anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that is it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. So I have 1 medium pizza with garlic and cheese, 1 large meat lovers pizza, 1 large pepperoni and onion pizza, and 1 two liter of Coca Cola. Ordering from Amazonas Pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct, please place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed. It will be ready for pick-up at Amazonas Pizza in 25 minutes. I have sent the receipt to your mobile phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you!
